Dear Hiba,

 

Both options are good for the approved cost. The only difference is the availability/timeline. 

 

ETA for option 2 (Beech Wood) is 10 weeks, plus approx. 1 week for installation works. We’ll definitely try to improve this duration once order is confirmed.

 

As for option 1 (Oak Wood), this is a fast moving material and is currently in-stock. We seek your final confirmation so we can advise the supplier (As we have asked the them to reserve the materials for us, for couple of days more).

 

Let us know how you wish to proceed.

 

Thanks and regards,

Solomon

 

solomon cruz​​​​

senior quantity surveyor
